item.title: Report X-2024021173
item.description:
Report X-2024021173

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-13
  • City: SHAKOPEE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading a trailer, the HazMat package was set aside on the rollers and began to leak. QA was called to to inspect and contain the spill. Package was moved to a well ventilated area. DescribePack: Cap was not secured to one of the gallon jugs, found at the bottom of the package. Whole gallon lost. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Absorbent pads and hazmat bags were used to contain the spill.

item.title: Report X-2024020892
item.description:
Report X-2024020892

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: load side manager called out a damaged hazmat. HESS specialist responded and retrieved it in a lined tote, bringing it back to the damage area and placing it atop the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. DescribePack: one bottle leaked from the vented cap due to improper handling. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats
